checks.name: notebook_root_access
checks.title: Verify Root Access is Disabled for SageMaker Notebooks
checks.risk: Enabling root access in SageMaker notebooks can lead to security vulnerabilities by granting full control over the notebook environment.

remediation.text: Disable root access for SageMaker notebooks to enforce security best practices. Configure the RootAccess parameter to 'Disabled' in the SageMaker console or through the API.

checks.name: notebook_with_direct_internet_access
checks.title: Ensure SageMaker Notebooks Do Not Have Direct Internet Access
checks.risk: Direct internet access from SageMaker notebooks can expose them to security threats and data breaches.

remediation.text: Configure SageMaker notebooks to use a VPC without direct internet access. This setup enhances network security and reduces the risk of unauthorized external access.

checks.name: model_isolation_enabled
checks.title: Ensure Network Isolation is Enabled for SageMaker Models
checks.risk: Models without network isolation may be vulnerable to unauthorized data access or cyber attacks.

remediation.text: Enable network isolation for SageMaker models to prevent unauthorized data access and ensure data security.

checks.name: model_vpc_settings_enabled
checks.title: Ensure VPC is configured for SageMaker Models
checks.risk: Models without VPC isolation may be vulnerable to unauthorized data access or cyber attacks.

remediation.text: Restrict which traffic can access by launching Studio in a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) of your choosing.

checks.name: notebook_vpc_settings_enabled
checks.title: Ensure VPC is configured for SageMaker Notebook
checks.risk: Notebook without VPC isolation may be vulnerable to unauthorized data access or cyber attacks.

remediation.text: Restrict which traffic can access by launching Studio in a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) of your choosing.

checks.name: training_job_vpc_settings_enabled
checks.title: Ensure VPC is configured for SageMaker Training Jobs
checks.risk: Training Jobs without VPC isolation may be vulnerable to unauthorized data access or cyber attacks.

remediation.text: Restrict which traffic can access by launching Studio in a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) of your choosing.
